original_title: Rumesh Tharanga sets new Sri Lanka and meet record at Asian Throwing Championships
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s Rumesh Tharanga has renewed the meet record and Sri Lanka record in the Javelin Throw event after clinching the Gold Medal at the Asian Throwing Championships, a short while ago.
Tharanga won gold at the Asian Throwing Championships with the new Sri Lanka record of 85.45m.
The Asian Throwing Championships is being held in South Korea.
